title: Star guardian quiz icon
body: It's literally been months and i did the icon during the time that it first came out, I've been soooo patient and i really wanted that icon, i'm super disappointed that it still hasn't been resolved.

replies.body: The quiz granted icons for a very limited time, and I'm not sure we'd be able to verify it at this point.  Just in case, though, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if there's anything we can do.  See you there!
